product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Adventure Chair - Special Buy
long_description: Kick back and relax by the campfire in the comfortable, durable ALPS Mountaineering Adventure Chair. PVC-coated polyester mesh seat and powder-coated steel frame make this chair as durable as it is comfortable. Compact design folds up to let you store it almost anywhere. Special buy.
short_description: Kick back and relax by the campfire in the comfortable, durable ALPS Mountaineering Adventure Chair.
